member.name: F:Topsens.CloudFrame.Pixels
member.summary: The collection of image pixels. The length of the array is * .

member.name: T:Topsens.ColorFrame
member.remarks: Contains a complete frame of color images captured from sensor.

member.name: F:Topsens.ColorFrame.Pixels
member.summary: The collection of image pixels. Each pixel containing four bytes of red, green, blue and alpha channels. The length of the array is * .

member.name: M:Topsens.ColorFrame.CopyTo(Topsens.ColorFrame)
member.summary: Copies one image frame to the other image frame object.

member.name: T:Topsens.DepthFrame
member.remarks: Contains a complete frame of depth images captured from sensor.

member.name: F:Topsens.DepthFrame.Pixels
member.summary: The collection of image pixels. Each element represents the distance from the point on the photographed object to the imaging plane of the sensor, in millimeters. The length of the array is * .

member.name: F:Topsens.DepthFrame.Projection
member.summary: Projection parameters. Contains 4 elements: horizontal focal length, vertical focal length, horizontal center coordinate and vertical center coordinate.

member.name: M:Topsens.DepthFrame.CopyTo(Topsens.DepthFrame)
member.summary: Copies one image frame to the other image frame object.

member.name: T:Topsens.Error
member.remarks: Method return value. Indicating the result of the method execution.

member.name: F:Topsens.Error.Initialization
member.summary: Initialization failed or not initialized before use.

member.name: F:Topsens.Error.DevicePermission
member.summary: Device is not granted with permission for access.

member.name: T:Topsens.Joint
member.remarks: Contains a three-dimensional spatial information of a joint in the application scenario.

member.name: F:Topsens.Joint.Position
member.summary: Represents the X, Y and Z coordinates in three-dimensional space.

member.name: F:Topsens.Joint.Rotation
member.summary: The quaternion {x, y, z, w}, representing the spatial rotation of the current joint relative to T-pose in world space coordinates.

member.name: F:Topsens.Joint.Orientation
member.summary: The rotation expression of the joint relative to T-Pose in world space coordinates, and the three elements representing the rotated X, Y and Z axes of the joint.

member.name: F:Topsens.Orientation.PortraitClockwise
member.summary: Portrait direction, rotate 90 degrees clockwise to get landscape image.

member.name: F:Topsens.Orientation.PortraitAntiClockwise
member.summary: Portrait direction, rotate 90 degrees anticlockwise to get landscape image.

member.name: F:Topsens.Resolution.Disabled
member.summary: Turn off the image data stream

member.name: T:Topsens.ResolutionExtension
member.summary: The extension class of image resolution.

member.name: M:Topsens.ResolutionExtension.Width(Topsens.Resolution)
member.summary: The pixels width of image resolution.
member.param: The enum value of image resolution.
member.returns: The pixels number of image width.

member.name: M:Topsens.ResolutionExtension.Height(Topsens.Resolution)
member.summary: The pixels height of image resolution.
member.param: The enum value of image resolution.
member.returns: The pixels number of image height.

member.name: T:Topsens.Skeleton
member.remarks: Contains skeleton data for an identified user.

member.name: F:Topsens.Skeleton.UserId
member.summary: The ID assigned to the user starting from 1 to distinguish multiple users in the scene.

member.name: F:Topsens.Skeleton.Tracked
member.summary: The user status indicating whether the user is successfully tracked in the current frame of data.

member.name: F:Topsens.Skeleton.Position
member.summary: The user position indicating the approximate location of the user's body center in the scene.

member.name: F:Topsens.Skeleton.Joints
member.summary: Joints data. Each element represents the three-dimensional position of a joint on the use's body in the scene.

member.name: M:Topsens.Skeleton.CopyTo(Topsens.Skeleton)
member.summary: Copies one skeleton data to another skeleton data object.

member.name: T:Topsens.UserMask
member.remarks: Contains mask information of the identified user in the depth image or color image.

member.name: F:Topsens.UserMask.Width
member.summary: Mask image width in pixels. It is equal to the corresponding depth image width.

member.name: F:Topsens.UserMask.Height
member.summary: Mask image height in pixels. It is equal to the corresponding depth image height.

member.name: F:Topsens.UserMask.Pixels
member.summary: Mask image pixel collection, array length is * . Each pixel values is equal to the user ID to which the corresponding pixel in the depth image belongs. For example, if the mask pixel value of x=100 and y=100 is 1, the depth pixel corresponding to x=100 and y=100 in depth image belongs to the user body with ID=1.

member.name: M:Topsens.UserMask.CopyTo(Topsens.UserMask)
member.summary: Copies one mask image to the other mask image object.

member.name: T:Topsens.UsersFrame
member.remarks: Contains user data generated from the input depth frame calculation.

member.name: F:Topsens.UsersFrame.Skeletons
member.summary: The collection of user skeleton data. Each element corresponds to all identified skeleton joints of a user. The effective length of this array is .

member.name: F:Topsens.UsersFrame.UserMask
member.summary: User mask data. Represents the relationship between each pixel in the depth image and the user.

member.name: F:Topsens.UsersFrame.GroundPlane
member.summary: The plane equation of the ground detected in the scene. The four elements represent the four coefficients A, B, C and D in the plane equation Ax+By+Cz+D=0.

member.name: F:Topsens.UsersFrame.Projection
member.summary: Projection parameters. Contains 4 elements: horizontal focal length, vertical focal length, horizontal center coordinate and vertical center coordinate.

member.name: F:Topsens.UsersFrame.Timestamp
member.summary: The data timestamp in milliseconds. It is the same as the timestamp of the corresponding input depth image, and is used to synchronize the depth image.

member.name: M:Topsens.UsersFrame.MapTo2D(Topsens.Vector3)
member.summary: Obtains a projection of a skeleton joint in a depth camera space on the two-dimensional depth image.
member.remarks: The screen coordinate origin point (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the screen.
member.param: The coordinates of the skeleton joint in 3D space.
member.returns: Two-dimensional coordinates obtained after projection calculation of skeleton joint.

member.name: M:Topsens.UsersFrame.CopyTo(Topsens.UsersFrame)
member.summary: Copies one users frame to the other users frame object.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector2.X
member.summary: X-axis component. Rightward direction is positive.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector2.Y
member.summary: Y-axis component. Downward direction is positive.

member.name: M:Topsens.Vector2.IsNaN
member.summary: Checks whether the vector contains NaN.
member.returns: True if the vector contains any NaN, otherwise false.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector2.NaN
member.summary: The NaN vector with all components equal to NaN.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector3.X
member.summary: X-axis component. Rightward direction is positive.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector3.Y
member.summary: Y-axis component. Upward direction is positive.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector3.Z
member.summary: Z-axis component. The camera illumination direction is positive.

member.name: M:Topsens.Vector3.IsNaN
member.summary: Checks whether the vector contains NaN.
member.returns: True if the vector contains any NaN, otherwise false.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector3.NaN
member.summary: The NaN vector with all components equal to NaN.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector4.X
member.summary: When representing the ground plane equation, X is the coefficient 'A' in equation Ax + By + Cz + D = 0. When representing the projection to the image, X is the focal in horizontal direction. When representing the space rotation, X is the coefficient 'b' in quaternion a + bi + cj + dk.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector4.Y
member.summary: When representing the ground plane equation, Y is the coefficient 'B' in equation Ax + By + Cz + D = 0. When representing the projection to the image, Y is the focal in vertical direction. When representing the space rotation, Y is the coefficient 'c' in quaternion a + bi + cj + dk.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector4.Z
member.summary: When representing the ground plane equation, Z is the coefficient 'C' in equation Ax + By + Cz + D = 0. When representing the projection to the image, Z is the center in horizontal direction. When representing the space rotation, Z is the coefficient 'd' in quaternion a + bi + cj + dk.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector4.W
member.summary: When representing the ground plane equation, W is coefficient 'D' in equation Ax + By + Cz + D = 0. When representing the projection to the image, W is the center in vertical direction. When representing the space rotation, W is the coefficient 'a' in quaternion a + bi + cj + dk.

member.name: M:Topsens.Vector4.IsNaN
member.summary: Checks whether the vector contains NaN.
member.returns: True if the vector contains any NaN, otherwise false.

member.name: F:Topsens.Vector4.NaN
member.summary: The NaN vector with all components equal to NaN.
